primaryAbilities.name: Sacred Sweep
primaryAbilities.description: Sweep the area with sacred power, dealing 80 damage to enemies and an additional 160 damage to enemies caught in the center.

primaryAbilities.name: Ray Of Heaven
primaryAbilities.description: Consume your stored energy and heal allied Heroes in the area for the amount of energy consumed.

primaryAbilities.name: Detainment Strike
primaryAbilities.description: Deal 100 damage to the first enemy Hero hit and knock them back. If they collide with terrain, they are also stunned for 1.25 seconds and take an additional 100 damage.

heroicAbilities.name: Crystal Aegis
heroicAbilities.description: Place an allied Hero into Stasis for 2 seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals 270 damage to all nearby enemies.

heroicAbilities.name: Resurrect
heroicAbilities.description: Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for 3 seconds, bringing them back to life with 50% of their maximum health at the location where they died.

heroTrait.name: Bestow Hope
heroTrait.description: Bestow an allied Hero with Hope. While they remain near you, damage they deal causes you to gain energy. You can only have Bestow Hope on 1 ally at a time. 40% of damage dealt to Heroes and 8% dealt to non-Heroes is stored as energy. You can store up to 505 energy.

primaryAbilities.name: Fel Flame
primaryAbilities.description: Release a wave of flame, dealing massive damage to enemies.

primaryAbilities.name: Drain Life
primaryAbilities.description: Drain the life from an enemy over 3 seconds, dealing heavy damage each second and healing Gul'dan for a large amount of Health.

primaryAbilities.name: Corruption
primaryAbilities.description: Call forth 3 bursts of shadow energy, dealing massive damage over 6 seconds. Corruption can stack up to 3 times on an enemy.

heroicAbilities.name: Horrify
heroicAbilities.description: After a short delay, deal heavy damage and cast Fear on enemy Heroes in the area for 2 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Rain of Destruction
heroicAbilities.description: Summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals heavy damage in a small area.

heroTrait.name: Life Tap
heroTrait.description: Gul'dan does not regenerate Mana. Activate to restore 25% Mana at the cost of some of your Health.

primaryAbilities.name: Arcane Rift
primaryAbilities.description: Launch a Rift that deals moderate damage to enemies in its path. If an enemy Hero is hit, reduce Arcane Rift's cooldown by 5 seconds and refund a moderate amount of mana.

primaryAbilities.name: Force of Will
primaryAbilities.description: Protect an allied Hero from all damage for 1.5 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Portal
primaryAbilities.description: Create a set of portals between you and the target location, allowing allies to teleport between both. The portals last 6 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Poly Bomb
heroicAbilities.description: Polymorph an enemy Hero, suppressing their attacks and Silencing them for 2 seconds. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

heroicAbilities.name: Ley Line Seal
heroicAbilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that imprisons enemy Heroes in Stasis for 3 seconds.

heroTrait.name: Raven Form
heroTrait.description: Instead of mounting, Medivh can transform into a raven, increasing Movement Speed by 15%. While transformed, Medivh can see and fly over all terrain and is immune to all effects.

primaryAbilities.name: Sand Blast
primaryAbilities.description: After 1 second, fire a missile that deals massive damage to the first enemy Hero hit.

primaryAbilities.name: Dragon's Breath
primaryAbilities.description: Fire a blast into the air that lands after 1.5 seconds, dealing massive damage to enemies in an area. Enemies cannot see where the blast will land.

primaryAbilities.name: Time Trap
primaryAbilities.description: Place a Time Trap that arms and Stealths after 2 seconds. The first enemy Hero to touch it will be put in Stasis for 2 seconds. Only 1 trap can exist at once.

heroicAbilities.name: Slowing Sands
heroicAbilities.description: Place a sand vortex that greatly slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active, the more it slows, up to 50% after 5 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Temporal Loop
heroicAbilities.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will be teleported back to the location where you cast Temporal Loop on them.

heroTrait.name: Timewalker
heroTrait.description: You’ve traveled to the future, and as such, will learn your Talents 1 level earlier than your teammates!

primaryAbilities.name: Blink
primaryAbilities.description: Dash towards an area. Stores 3 charges.

primaryAbilities.name: Melee
primaryAbilities.description: Deal heavy damage to a nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes. Gain 5% Pulse Bomb charge when damaging an enemy, and 10% against Heroes.

primaryAbilities.name: Recall
primaryAbilities.description: Return to the position you were at 3 seconds ago, refill your ammo, and remove all negative status effects from yourself.

heroicAbilities.name: Pulse Bomb
heroicAbilities.description: Fire a short range bomb that attaches to enemy units if you hit them. The bomb explodes after 1.5 seconds dealing massive damage to them and heavy damage to other nearby enemies. This Ability is slowly charged over time by dealing damage to enemies with Basic Attacks and Melee.

heroTrait.name: Reload
heroTrait.description: Tracer can Basic Attack while moving, and after attacking 10 times needs to reload. She can manually reload early by activating Reload.

primaryAbilities.name: Drag
primaryAbilities.description: Lash out with your tongue, dealing heavy damage to the first enemy hit and dragging them with you for 1.75 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Dark Swarm
primaryAbilities.description: Deal moderate damage each second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds, and become able to move through units. Deals double damage to Heroes. Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.

primaryAbilities.name: Burrow
primaryAbilities.description: Burrow into the ground, entering Stasis and becoming Invulnerable for 2 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Isolation
heroicAbilities.description: Launch biomass that deals massive damage to the first enemy Hero hit, silencing and slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Only allows them to see a very short distance for 6 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Adaptation
heroicAbilities.description: After 5 seconds, heal for 60% of the damage you took over this period.

heroTrait.name: Essence Collection
heroTrait.description: Gain 10 Essence from Takedowns and 2 Essence from nearby Minions dying. Activate to consume all Essence and heal yourself over 5 seconds, with more Health being restored the more Essence you consume. Maximum of 50 Essence. Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.

primaryAbilities.name: Spectral Scythe
primaryAbilities.description: Summon a scythe that travels to you after 1 second, dealing massive damage to enemies.

primaryAbilities.name: Cursed Strikes
primaryAbilities.description: Your Basic Attacks deal damage in a wide area and reduce the Attack Speed of enemies by 50% for 2 seconds. Lasts 4 seconds once triggered.

primaryAbilities.name: Bone Prison
primaryAbilities.description: After a 2 second delay, deals heavy damage and roots the target enemy Hero for 2 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Poison Nova
heroicAbilities.description: After a short delay, release poisonous missiles that deal massive damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Skeletal Mages
heroicAbilities.description: Summon 4 Frost Mages in a line that deal moderate damage to nearby enemies and slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Lasts up to 15 seconds.

heroTrait.name: Raise Skeleton
heroTrait.description: When a nearby enemy Minion dies, it becomes a Skeletal Warrior that deals moderate damage and lasts up to 15 seconds. Up to 4 Skeletal Warriors can be active at once.

primaryAbilities.name: Magic Missiles
primaryAbilities.description: Fire three missiles toward an area, each dealing heavy damage to the first enemy hit.

primaryAbilities.name: Arcane Orb
primaryAbilities.description: Fire an orb that powers up as it travels, dealing heavy damage to the first enemy hit. The further the orb travels, the harder it hits—up to massive damage at maximum range.

primaryAbilities.name: Teleport
primaryAbilities.description: Teleport a short distance instantly.

heroicAbilities.name: Disintegrate
heroicAbilities.description: Channel a powerful beam, dealing massive damage over 2.5 seconds to enemies caught in it. The direction of the beam changes with your cursor’s position.

heroicAbilities.name: Wave of Force
heroicAbilities.description: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal heavy damage.

heroTrait.name: Critical Mass
heroTrait.description: Getting a Takedown will refresh the cooldown on all of your Abilities.

primaryAbilities.name: Gilnean Cocktail
primaryAbilities.description: Hurl a flask that does moderate damage to the  first enemy hit and explodes for massive damage to enemies in a cone behind them.

primaryAbilities.name: Inner Beast
primaryAbilities.description: Gain 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh this duration.

primaryAbilities.name: Darkflight
primaryAbilities.description: Shapeshift into a Worgen and leap at an enemy dealing heavy damage.

heroicAbilities.name: Go for the Throat
heroicAbilities.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing 3 times for massive total damage. If this kills them, this ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

heroicAbilities.name: Marked for the Kill
heroicAbilities.description: Shapeshift into a Human and fire a shot hitting the first enemy Hero for moderate damage. For 5 seconds, they are Vulnerable, taking 25% more damage, and you can re-activate this to leap at them and shapeshift into a Worgen.

heroTrait.name: Curse of the Worgen
heroTrait.description: Use certain Abilities to shift between a Human and a Worgen. While Human, your Basic Attack is ranged. While Worgen, your Basic Attack is melee but deals 40% more damage.

primaryAbilities.name: Noxious Blossom
primaryAbilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, cause an area to explode with pollen, dealing heavy damage.

primaryAbilities.name: Crippling Spores
primaryAbilities.description: Enemies currently afflicted by Nature’s Toxin have its duration increased by 3 seconds and are slowed by 40% decaying over 3 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Wisp
primaryAbilities.description: Spawn a Wisp to scout an area. Can be redirected once active. Lasts 45 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Thornwood Vine
heroicAbilities.description: Send forth vines that deal heavy damage to all enemies in a line. Can hold 3 charges.

heroicAbilities.name: Leaping Strike
heroicAbilities.description: Leap over an enemy, slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and dealing massive damage. Has 2 charges.

heroTrait.name: Nature's Toxin
heroTrait.description: Your Basic Attacks and damaging Abilities poison their target, dealing light damage each second for 3 seconds. Every additional application increases the duration by 3 seconds, up to a maximum of 9 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Surging Fist
primaryAbilities.description: Wind up for at least 1 second temporarily slowing yourself, then reactivate to charge in a direction. Enemies in your path are knocked aside and take moderate damage.

primaryAbilities.name: Consuming Blaze
primaryAbilities.description: Ignite nearby enemies, dealing heavy damage over 4 seconds. If this hits an enemy, gain a large amount of health over 4 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Rune Bomb
primaryAbilities.description: Roll a bomb dealing heavy damage to enemies in its path. Gall can use Runic Blast to detonate it and deal massive area damage.

heroicAbilities.name: Hammer of Twilight
heroicAbilities.description: Passively increases Basic Attack damage by 25%. Activate to swing the Hammer and deal massive damage, push enemies away, and stun for 0.75 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Upheaval
heroicAbilities.description: After 1 second, pull enemies toward you, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing moderate damage.

heroTrait.name: Two-Headed
heroTrait.description: Gall is permanently attached to you, going where you go.

primaryAbilities.name: Blade Dash
primaryAbilities.description: Dash forward, dealing moderate damage to all enemies along the way. Then turn and dash to your original position dealing large damage to all enemies in the way.

primaryAbilities.name: Twin Blades
primaryAbilities.description: Your next basic attack strikes the enemy 2 times.

primaryAbilities.name: Phase Prism
primaryAbilities.description: Swap positions with an enemy Hero, dealing moderate damage.

heroicAbilities.name: Suppression Pulse
heroicAbilities.description: Deals large damage to enemies in an area and blinds them for 4 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Purifier Beam
heroicAbilities.description: Fire an orbital beam that deals massive damage and chases its target for 8 seconds.

heroTrait.name: Shield Overload
heroTrait.description: Automatically gain a powerful shield for 5 seconds when you take damage while below 50% health. Your basic attacks lower the shield’s cooldown by 4 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Healing Beam
primaryAbilities.description: Heal an ally for a very large amount of Health each second as long as they are in range.

primaryAbilities.name: Safeguard
primaryAbilities.description: Grant an ally Resistant, reducing damage taken by 25% for 3 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Displacement Grenade
primaryAbilities.description: Fire a grenade that explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing massive damage, knocking enemies away.

heroicAbilities.name: Stim Drone
heroicAbilities.description: Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Medivac Dropship
heroicAbilities.description: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 10 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.

heroTrait.name: Caduceus Reactor
heroTrait.description: Regenerate 3% of your maximum Health every second after not taking damage for 4 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Spirit Swoop
primaryAbilities.description: Deal moderate damage to enemies in a line, slowing them by 30% for 2 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Misha, Charge!
primaryAbilities.description: Misha charges in a line, dealing moderate damage and stunning enemies for 1.25 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Mend Pet
primaryAbilities.description: Heal Misha for a large amount of Health over 5 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Unleash the Boars
heroicAbilities.description: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing moderate damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Bestial Wrath
heroicAbilities.description: Increases Misha's basic attack damage by 150% for 12 seconds.

heroTrait.name: Misha
heroTrait.description: Activate to command Misha to alternately stay by your side or attack your enemies.

primaryAbilities.name: Radiant Dash
primaryAbilities.description: Jump to target ally or enemy. Enemy targets are hit with a Basic Attack. 2 charges.

primaryAbilities.name: Breath of Heaven
primaryAbilities.description: Heal yourself and nearby allies for a moderate amount and give 10% movement speed for 3 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Deadly Reach
primaryAbilities.description: Gain 100% attack speed and 100% attack range for 2 seconds. Bonuses and the cooldown activate on your next Basic Attack after casting Deadly Reach.

heroicAbilities.name: Seven-Sided Strike
heroicAbilities.description: Become Invulnerable while striking the highest health nearby enemy hero for 7% of their maximum health up to 7 times.

heroicAbilities.name: Divine Palm
heroicAbilities.description: If the target ally would be killed within the next 3 seconds they are instead healed for a large amount.

heroTrait.name: Pick Your Trait
heroTrait.description: Choose between Transcendence, Iron Fists, and Insight from the Talents panel.

primaryAbilities.name: Skeletal Swing
primaryAbilities.description: Wind up a large attack that deals heavy damage and slows enemies by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Drain Hope
primaryAbilities.description: Throw out a chain, attaching to the first enemy Hero hit, slowing your Movement Speed by 15%, dealing up to 20% of your target's max Health, while restoring up to 20% of your max Health.

primaryAbilities.name: Wraith Walk
primaryAbilities.description: Separate from your body, moving unhindered and gaining Movement Speed for 2.5 seconds. When Wraith Walk ends or is cancelled, your body jumps to your Ghost.

heroicAbilities.name: Entomb
heroicAbilities.description: Create an unpathable, indestructible cul-de-sac of pain in front of you for 4 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: March of the Black King
heroicAbilities.description: Swing your mace three times, healing yourself for 15% of your max Health for each enemy Hero hit and dealing massive damage.

heroTrait.name: Undying
heroTrait.description: Become a Ghost when you die, and resurrect upon reaching full health. Your abilities do not do damage while Undying.

primaryAbilities.name: Hamstring
primaryAbilities.description: Slams your axe down into the ground, dealing moderate damage and slowing units by 50%. This slow fades over 2 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Butcher's Brand
primaryAbilities.description: Deal moderate damage to an enemy and cause your Basic Attacks against them to heal you for 75% of the damage done for 5 seconds. Healing doubled versus Heroes.

primaryAbilities.name: Ruthless Onslaught
primaryAbilities.description: Charge at an enemy, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed. If you reach the target, they are stunned for 1 second and take moderate damage.

heroicAbilities.name: Lamb to the Slaughter
heroicAbilities.description: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay. This deals heavy damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post for 4 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Furnace Blast
heroicAbilities.description: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around you dealing massive damage to enemies. Can be cast while using Full Boar.

heroTrait.name: Fresh Meat
heroTrait.description: Nearby enemies drop Fresh meat upon death (Heroes drop triple), which you can pick up to gain 1% bonus Attack Damage. Can hold up to 25 Meat. All meat is lost on dying.

primaryAbilities.name: Punish
primaryAbilities.description: Deal moderate damage and slow enemies by 60% decaying over 2 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Condemn
primaryAbilities.description: After 1 second, you pull nearby enemies toward you, stunning them for 0.25 seconds and dealing light damage.

primaryAbilities.name: Shield Glare
primaryAbilities.description: Deal moderate damage to enemies and cause them to miss their next 2 Basic Attacks within 4 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Falling Sword
heroicAbilities.description: You leap toward an area. While in the air, you can steer the landing location by moving. After 2 seconds you land, dealing heavy damage to nearby enemies and knocking them into the air.

heroicAbilities.name: Blessed Shield
heroicAbilities.description: Deal heavy damage and stun the first enemy hit for 2 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to nearby enemies, dealing moderate damage and stunning them for 1 second.

heroTrait.name: Iron Skin
heroTrait.description: Become unstoppable and gain a shield that absorbs a massive amount of damage for 4 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Flamestrike
primaryAbilities.description: After a short delay, deal heavy damage in an area. Verdant Spheres increases the radius by 50% and also increases damage dealt.

primaryAbilities.name: Living Bomb
primaryAbilities.description: Deal heavy damage over 3 seconds to an enemy, then they explode dealing moderate damage to all nearby enemies. Casting a second Living Bomb on an enemy causes the previous Living Bomb to explode immediately. Verdant Spheres makes this Ability cost no Mana and have no cooldown.

primaryAbilities.name: Gravity Lapse
primaryAbilities.description: Stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Verdant Spheres causes Gravity Lapse to stun the first 3 enemies hit.

heroicAbilities.name: Phoenix
heroicAbilities.description: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing light damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for light damage and splashing for 50%.

heroicAbilities.name: Pyroblast
heroicAbilities.description: After 2 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals massive damage to an enemy Hero and nearby enemies.

heroTrait.name: Verdant Spheres
heroTrait.description: Activate to make your next Basic Ability more powerful.

primaryAbilities.name: Withering Fire
primaryAbilities.description: Deal moderate damage to the closest enemy, preferring Heroes. Stores 5 charges. Gain 1 charge on nearby enemy Minion or Mercenary deaths, and 3 charges on nearby enemy Hero deaths.

primaryAbilities.name: Shadow Dagger
primaryAbilities.description: Deals light damage to a target initially, followed by moderate damage over the next 2 seconds. The effect spreads to nearby targets.

primaryAbilities.name: Haunting Wave
primaryAbilities.description: Send forth a wave of banshees dealing moderate damage to all targets. Reactivate to teleport to the banshees' location.

heroicAbilities.name: Wailing Arrow
heroicAbilities.description: Shoot an arrow that explodes for massive damage and silences enemies for 2.5 seconds. Can be reactivated to detonate the arrow early.

heroicAbilities.name: Mind Control
heroicAbilities.description: After 1 second, take control of an enemy Hero's movement and prevent them from doing anything else. Channel lasts 2.5 seconds.

heroTrait.name: Black Arrows
heroTrait.description: Basic Attacks and Abilities stun Minions, Mercenaries, and Towers for 1 second.

primaryAbilities.name: Spin to Win!
primaryAbilities.description: The Vikings use a highly advanced Nordic battle tactic, spinning wildly and giving every enemy caught within their whirl a solid knock on the head.

primaryAbilities.name: Jump!
primaryAbilities.description: Physical fitness is core to the Viking lifestyle. Rigorous training allows the Vikings to leap out of harm's way, avoiding all damage and bounding over enemies trying to block them in.

primaryAbilities.name: Norse Force!
primaryAbilities.description: The best thing about being a Viking is that someone always has your back. Using Norse Force, the Vikings armor up, gaining more armor when more Vikings are still standing.

heroicAbilities.name: Longboat Raid!
heroicAbilities.description: All Vikings are fierce invaders at heart. With this ability, all the Lost Vikings hop in a longboat that shoots a rapid fire cannon at nearby enemies, as well as a long-range mortar to destroy a wide swath of targets.

heroicAbilities.name: Play Again!
heroicAbilities.description: The trio ensures no Viking is left behind with this heroic ability, which allows any one of them to quickly raise fallen Vikings and gather the whole group in one spot.

heroTrait.name: Viking Hoard
heroTrait.description: Gathering a Regeneration Globe with a Viking permanently increases all their Health Regeneration by 0.5 per second

primaryAbilities.name: Chain Lightning
primaryAbilities.description: Deal moderate damage to an enemy and half that amount to 2 nearby enemies.

primaryAbilities.name: Feral Spirit
primaryAbilities.description: Send out a Feral Spirit that does moderate damage to enemies in its path. Upon hitting an enemy Hero, the wolf stops and roots that hero in place for 1 second.

primaryAbilities.name: Windfury
primaryAbilities.description: Increase your movement speed by 25% for 4 seconds. Your next 3 Basic Attacks occur 100% faster.

heroicAbilities.name: Sundering
heroicAbilities.description: After a short delay, sunder the earth in a long line. Deals massive damage and shoves enemies to the side, stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Earthquake
heroicAbilities.description: Summon a massive earthquake that periodically slows enemies in the area by 70%. Lasts for 10 seconds.

heroTrait.name: Frostwolf Resilience
heroTrait.description: Dealing damage with Abilities grants 1 stack of Frostwolf Resilience. At 5 stacks, you are instantly healed for a large amount of Health.

primaryAbilities.name: Frostbolt
primaryAbilities.description: Deal moderate damage and Chill the target.

primaryAbilities.name: Blizzard
primaryAbilities.description: Bombard an area with 2 waves of ice, dealing moderate damage. Damaged enemies are Chilled.

primaryAbilities.name: Cone of Cold
primaryAbilities.description: Deal moderate damage in a cone and Chill targets.

heroicAbilities.name: Ring of Frost
heroicAbilities.description: After a short delay, create a Ring of Frost at target location that deals massive damage and roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

heroicAbilities.name: Summon Water Elemental
heroicAbilities.description: Summons a Water Elemental at target location, dealing moderate damage and Chilling nearby enemies. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks splash for 25% damage and Chill.

heroTrait.name: Frostbite
heroTrait.description: All abilities Chill targets, slowing Movement Speed by 25% and amplifying damage from your abilities by 50%. Lasts 4 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Impale
primaryAbilities.description: Deals moderate damage. Stuns for 1 second.

primaryAbilities.name: Harden Carapace
primaryAbilities.description: Gain a strong shield.

primaryAbilities.name: Burrow Charge
primaryAbilities.description: Burrows to location, dealing moderate damage and briefly stunning enemies in a small area upon surfacing. Can reactivate the Ability to surface early.

heroicAbilities.name: Locust Swarm
heroicAbilities.description: Deal light periodic damage in an area around Anub'arak. Each enemy damaged heals Anub'arak for a small amount of health.

heroicAbilities.name: Cocoon
heroicAbilities.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon for 8 seconds. Enemies wrapped in the cocoon are unable to act and are untargetable. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

heroTrait.name: Scarab Host
heroTrait.description: Spawn a Beetle at Anub'arak's location whenever he casts a spell. Beetles last for 10 seconds, attacking nearby enemies for light damage.

primaryAbilities.name: Globe of Annihilation
primaryAbilities.description: Shoot a Globe of Destruction, dealing heavy damage on impact. Long range.

primaryAbilities.name: Summon Demon Warrior
primaryAbilities.description: Spawn a Demon Warrior that marches toward a point. Warriors deal light damage and last 10 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: All Shall Burn
primaryAbilities.description: Channel a death beam of moderately increasing damage on an enemy. Does 25% more damage to Structures.

heroicAbilities.name: Demonic Invasion
heroicAbilities.description: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, each impact dealing light damage. Demon Grunts deal light damage which is doubled against non-Heroic targets.

heroicAbilities.name: Black Pool
heroicAbilities.description: Create a pool that empowers Azmodan, his Demons, and allied Minions, increasing their attack and ability damage by 75%. Pools last 5 seconds.

heroTrait.name: General of Hell
heroTrait.description: Summon a Demon Lieutenant at an allied Mercenary, Minion, or Summon. The lieutenant will march with the target, granting 15% increased damage and 15% increased maximum health to all nearby friendly Mercenaries, Minions, and Summons. Unlimited range.

primaryAbilities.name: Flying Kick
primaryAbilities.description: Kick through target enemy, dealing moderate damage.

primaryAbilities.name: Keg Smash
primaryAbilities.description: Smash your keg, dealing light damage and drenching affected enemies in Brew, slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Breath of Fire
primaryAbilities.description: Breathe a cone of flames, dealing moderate damage. Enemies soaked in Brew are set on fire, dealing additional moderate damage over 3 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Wandering Keg
heroicAbilities.description: Roll around inside the barrel, dealing moderate damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
heroicAbilities.description: Split into 3 elemental spirits for 15 seconds, each with 50% of your maximum Health, and enables two new leaping attacks for use.   Storm attacks  at range for moderate damage. Earth attacks slowly for light damage and slows enemies by 25%. Fire attacks quickly for light damage.

heroTrait.name: Fortifying Brew
heroTrait.description: Drink from your keg, gaining 40 Brew and temporary Shields each second, eventually resulting in a massive Shield that persists for 2 seconds after you stop drinking.

primaryAbilities.name: Chain Heal
primaryAbilities.description: Heal an ally for a large amount of Health, then heal up to two other nearby allies for a moderate amount of Health each.

primaryAbilities.name: Lightning Shield
primaryAbilities.description: Imbue an ally with lightning dealing light damage to nearby enemies and additional light periodic damage. Lasts 5 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Earthbind Totem
primaryAbilities.description: Create a totem that slows nearby enemies by 35%. The totem has a moderate amount of Health and lasts for 8 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Ancestral Healing
heroicAbilities.description: After a short delay, heals target allied Hero for a massive amount of Health.

heroicAbilities.name: Bloodlust
heroicAbilities.description: Give nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 30% Movement Speed. Lasts for 10 seconds.

heroTrait.name: Ghost Wolf
heroTrait.description: Instead of using a mount, Rehgar transforms into a Ghost Wolf, increasing movement speed by 30%. Transformation is instant and can be used while moving. Basic Attacks while in Ghost Wolf cancel the form but deal 100% increased damage.

primaryAbilities.name: Baneling Barrage
primaryAbilities.description: Launch 4 Banelings that deal moderate splash damage each.

primaryAbilities.name: Hunter Killer
primaryAbilities.description: Summon a Hydralisk to attack a single target, dealing moderate damage. Lasts 8 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Infested Drop
primaryAbilities.description: Bombard target area with a Zerg Drop Pod for moderate damage.  The pod spawns 2 Roachlings that deal light damage and last for 8 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Devouring Maw
heroicAbilities.description: Summons a Devouring Maw that deals moderate damage and devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight.

heroicAbilities.name: Nydus Network
heroicAbilities.description: Summon a Nydus Worm at target location that you can enter by right-clicking. While inside, you exit by targeting a Nydus Worm with R or right-clicking near the Worm. Maximum 4 Nydus Worms.

heroTrait.name: Creep Tumor
heroTrait.description: Lay a Creep Tumor that generates Creep. You and your summons move 20% faster on Creep and restore a small amount of Health each second. Tumors last 240 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Slime
primaryAbilities.description: Deal moderate damage and apply Slime on nearby enemies for 8 seconds, slowing enemies by 20%.  Does heavy damage to enemies who are already slimed.

primaryAbilities.name: Pufferfish
primaryAbilities.description: Spit out a Pufferfish at the target point. After 3 seconds, the fish will blow up for massive damage. Enemies can attack the fish to prevent it from exploding.

primaryAbilities.name: Safety Bubble
primaryAbilities.description: Becomes Invulnerable for 2 seconds. While active, you cannot attack or use abilities.

heroicAbilities.name: March of the Murlocs
heroicAbilities.description: Command a legion of Murlocs to march into a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals moderate damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Does half damage to Structures.

heroicAbilities.name: Octo-Grab
heroicAbilities.description: Summon an octopus to stun target enemy Hero for 3 seconds while you hit them for light damage.

heroTrait.name: Spawn Egg
heroTrait.description: Place an Egg at target location, revealing the nearby area. Upon dying, you respawn at the Egg after 5 seconds. If your Egg is killed, you are revealed to enemies for 15 seconds. You only grant 25% of a Hero's experience upon dying.

primaryAbilities.name: Arcane Flare
primaryAbilities.description: Deal heavy damage in a small area and moderate damage in a larger area.

primaryAbilities.name: Polymorph
primaryAbilities.description: Deal light damage. Target cannot attack or use Abilities for 2 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Pixie Dust
primaryAbilities.description: Increase targets Movement Speed by 20% and block 1 Hero Basic Attack, reducing their damage by 50%. Lasts 3 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Blink Heal
heroicAbilities.description: Teleport to nearby ally, healing them for a large amount of Health. Can store 2 charges.

heroicAbilities.name: Emerald Wind
heroicAbilities.description: Create an expanding nova of wind, dealing heavy damage and pushing enemies away.

heroTrait.name: Soothing Mist
heroTrait.description: Brightwing heals nearby allied Heroes for a moderate amount every 5 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Healing Brew
primaryAbilities.description: Heal lowest Health ally (prioritizing Heroes) for a moderate amount of Health.

primaryAbilities.name: Cloud Serpent
primaryAbilities.description: Summon a Cloud Serpent on target allied Hero that automatically attacks nearby enemies, doing light damage. Heroes can only have 1 Cloud Serpent at a time. Lasts for 8 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Blinding Wind
primaryAbilities.description: Throw a cloud of Blinding Wind at the 2 nearest enemies (prioritizing Heroes), dealing moderate damage. Targets miss their next 2 Basic Attacks in the next 4 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups
heroicAbilities.description: Rapidly tosses brew to the most injured nearby allies, prioritizing Heroes, restoring a massive amount of Health over 6 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Water Dragon
heroicAbilities.description: Summon a Water Dragon that after a delay hits the nearest enemy Hero and all enemies near them, dealing heavy damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

heroTrait.name: Fast Feet
heroTrait.description: Upon taking damage, gain 10% Movement Speed for 1 second.

primaryAbilities.name: Overkill
primaryAbilities.description: Deal massive damage to the target and heavy damage to nearby targets over 5 seconds. Reactivate to select a new target. Can move and use Abilities while channeling.

primaryAbilities.name: Frag Grenade
primaryAbilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals moderate damage, knocking enemies away.

primaryAbilities.name: Run and Gun
primaryAbilities.description: Charge forward and instantly wind up the Minigun.

heroicAbilities.name: Commandeer Odin
heroicAbilities.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. Lasts 23 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Drakken Laser Drill
heroicAbilities.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing moderate damage. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

heroTrait.name: Minigun
heroTrait.description: Your Attack Speed increases the longer that you attack, becoming fully wound up after 4 Basic Attacks. Lasts 3 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Symbiote
primaryAbilities.description: Assist another allied Unit or Combat Structure, allowing you to shield them and use new Abilities.  Cannot be used on another Hero's Summons.

primaryAbilities.name: Toxic Nest
primaryAbilities.description: Spawn a mine that becomes active after a short time. Deals moderate damage and reveals the enemy for 4 seconds. Lasts 90 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Ultimate Evolution
heroicAbilities.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Ability Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

heroicAbilities.name: Evolve Monstrosity
heroicAbilities.description: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 5% Health and 5% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 30 times. The Monstrosity takes 50% less damage from Minions and Structures.  Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows you to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.

heroTrait.name: Locust Strain
heroTrait.description: Spawns a Locust to attack down the nearest lane every 15 seconds. Locusts last for 25 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Death Coil
primaryAbilities.description: Deals heavy damage to target enemy.  Can be self-cast to heal for a large amount of Health.

primaryAbilities.name: Howling Blast
primaryAbilities.description: Root enemies within the target area for 1.5 seconds and deals moderate damage.

primaryAbilities.name: Frozen Tempest
primaryAbilities.description: Deals moderate damage each second to nearby enemies. Slows enemy Move Speed by 6% per second, stacking up to 30%.

heroicAbilities.name: Army of the Dead
heroicAbilities.description: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for a large amount of Health.

heroicAbilities.name: Summon Sindragosa
heroicAbilities.description: Deals heavy damage, slows enemy Heroes, and freezes Minions for 10 seconds and Structures for 20 seconds.

heroTrait.name: Frostmourne Hungers
heroTrait.description: Activate to make your next Basic Attack strike immediately, do 100% increased damage, and restore a moderate amount of Mana.

primaryAbilities.name: Shadow Charge
primaryAbilities.description: Charge an enemy, dealing moderate damage and stunning them for 0.5 seconds. If the enemy hits an unpathable location, they are stunned for 1 second.

primaryAbilities.name: Fire Stomp
primaryAbilities.description: Unleashes fire waves in all directions that each deal moderate damage.

primaryAbilities.name: Overpower
primaryAbilities.description: Grabs the target and slams it behind Diablo, dealing moderate damage and stunning for 0.25 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Apocalypse
heroicAbilities.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After a short period the rune explodes dealing heavy damage and stunning for 2 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Lightning Breath
heroicAbilities.description: Channel lightning that deals massive damage over 4 seconds. The direction of the Lightning changes with your mouse cursor position.

heroTrait.name: Black Soulstone
heroTrait.description: Gain 10 Souls per Hero killed, or 1 per Minion. For each Soul, increase maximum Health by a small amount. If you have 100 Souls upon dying, you resurrect in 5 seconds and lose 100 Souls. Maximum 100 Souls.

primaryAbilities.name: Powerslide
primaryAbilities.description: Slide to a location dealing moderate damage and stunning enemies hit for 1 second.

primaryAbilities.name: Face Melt
primaryAbilities.description: Deals moderate damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back.

primaryAbilities.name: Guitar Solo
primaryAbilities.description: Regenerate a small amount of Health each second for 4 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Mosh Pit
heroicAbilities.description: After a short delay, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Stage Dive
heroicAbilities.description: Leap to any location. Deals heavy damage to enemies in the area, slowing them for 3 seconds.

heroTrait.name: Rockstar
heroTrait.description: When you use a Basic or Heroic ability, give 20% Attack Speed for 3 seconds to all nearby allies. Minions gain half the bonus.

primaryAbilities.name: Hammerang
primaryAbilities.description: Throws out a Hammer that returns to you, dealing moderate damage and slowing enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Lightning Rod
primaryAbilities.description: Deals moderate damage to an enemy and additional light damage each second for 4 seconds if you remain close to the target.

primaryAbilities.name: Barrel Roll
primaryAbilities.description: Dashes forward and grants a strong Shield for 2 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Hinterland Blast
heroicAbilities.description: After a short delay, deals massive damage to enemies within a long line.

heroicAbilities.name: Mighty Gust
heroicAbilities.description: Push enemies away and slow their Movement Speed by 60%, decaying over 3 seconds.

heroTrait.name: Tailwind
heroTrait.description: Gain 20% increased Movement Speed after not taking damage for 6 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Rock-It! Turret
primaryAbilities.description: Creates a turret that deals moderate damage. Lasts for 30 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Deth Lazor
primaryAbilities.description: Charged attack that deals moderate to heavy damage to enemies in a line. Damage and range increase the longer the ability is charged up.

primaryAbilities.name: Xplodium Charge
primaryAbilities.description: Places a bomb that deals moderate damage to enemies within target area after 2.5 seconds, stunning them for 2 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Robo-Goblin
heroicAbilities.description: Basic Attacks deal an additional 150% damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Structures.

heroicAbilities.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000
heroicAbilities.description: After a short delay, pulls enemies towards the center of the target area and deals heavy damage.

heroTrait.name: Salvager
heroTrait.description: Destroyed enemy Structures and your Rock-it! Turrets drop scrap. Collecting scrap restores a moderate amount of Mana and causes your Abilities to cooldown twice as fast for 3 seconds.  Activate Salvager to dismantle a target Rock-it! Turret and turn it into scrap.

primaryAbilities.name: Dive
primaryAbilities.description: Dive at the target, dealing moderate damage and flipping over them.

primaryAbilities.name: Sweeping Strike
primaryAbilities.description: Dash towards target point, dealing moderate damage to enemies along the way. If you hit an enemy, Basic Attacks do 35% more damage for 4 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Evasion
primaryAbilities.description: Evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Metamorphosis
heroicAbilities.description: Transform into demon form at the target location, dealing massive damage in the area. Gain a large amount of temporary max Health for each Hero hit and 20% increased Attack Speed. Lasts for 18 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: The Hunt
heroicAbilities.description: Charge to target unit, dealing heavy damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

heroTrait.name: Betrayer's Thirst
heroTrait.description: Basic Attacks heal for 20% of damage dealt and reduce your Ability cooldowns by 1 second.

primaryAbilities.name: Ravage
primaryAbilities.description: Leap to a target, dealing moderate damage. If this kills the target, its cooldown is instantly reset.

primaryAbilities.name: Impaling Blades
primaryAbilities.description: Deals heavy damage to enemies within the target area, stunning them for 1 second.

primaryAbilities.name: Primal Grasp
primaryAbilities.description: Pulls enemies within the target area towards you, dealing moderate damage.

heroicAbilities.name: Maelstrom
heroicAbilities.description: Deals moderate damage each second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 9 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Summon Ultralisk
heroicAbilities.description: Summons an Ultralisk that attacks the target to deal moderate damage. Attacks splash to nearby enemies for 50% damage. Lasts for 20 seconds.

heroTrait.name: Assimilation
heroTrait.description: Gain 10% of damage dealt from Basic Attacks and Abilities as Shields for 6 seconds. Shield amount gained doubled against Heroes.

primaryAbilities.name: Regrowth
primaryAbilities.description: Heal target ally for a moderate amount of Health instantly and an additional large amount of Health over 10 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Moonfire
primaryAbilities.description: Deals light damage to enemies within target area and reveals them for 2 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Entangling Roots
primaryAbilities.description: Root enemies within the target area for 1.5 seconds, and deals light damage over the duration. Affected area grows over 3 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Tranquility
heroicAbilities.description: Heals a moderate amount of Health each second to nearby allies over 10 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Twilight Dream
heroicAbilities.description: After a short delay, deal massive damage in a large area around you, silencing enemies for 3 seconds.

heroTrait.name: Innervate
heroTrait.description: Grant target allied Hero a large amount of Mana over 10 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Storm Bolt
primaryAbilities.description: Throw a hammer, dealing moderate damage to the first enemy hit and stunning it for 1.5 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Thunder Clap
primaryAbilities.description: Deals moderate damage and slows enemies by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Dwarf Toss
primaryAbilities.description: Leap to target location, dealing moderate damage to enemies on landing.

heroicAbilities.name: Avatar
heroicAbilities.description: Transform for 20 seconds, gaining a massive amount of Health and causing your Basic Attacks to stun enemies.

heroicAbilities.name: Haymaker
heroicAbilities.description: Stun target enemy Hero, and wind up a punch dealing massive damage and knocking the target back, hitting enemies in the way for moderate damage and knocking them aside.

heroTrait.name: Second Wind
heroTrait.description: Restore a moderate amount of Health each second when you have not taken damage for 4 seconds. When below 40% Health, Health restored per second doubles.

primaryAbilities.name: Corpse Spiders
primaryAbilities.description: Deal moderate damage and create 3 Corpse Spiders that deal light damage. Spiders last for 4 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Zombie Wall
primaryAbilities.description: After a short delay, create a ring of Zombies surrounding the target area that deal light damage and last for 3 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Plague of Toads
primaryAbilities.description: Create 5 Toads that deal moderate damage.

heroicAbilities.name: Gargantuan
heroicAbilities.description: Summon a Gargantuan that deals moderate impact damage when created. The Gargantuan's Basic Attacks deal heavy damage and splash for 50%. It can also grab enemy Minions, and will stomp nearby enemies for moderate damage and slow their Movement Speed by 30%. Lasts for 20 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Ravenous Spirit
heroicAbilities.description: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals moderate damage each second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.

heroTrait.name: Voodoo Ritual
heroTrait.description: Ability and attack damage poisons enemies for a small amount of additional damage over 4 seconds.   If a poisoned enemy dies, Nazeebo regenerates 2% Health and 1% Mana.

primaryAbilities.name: Snipe
primaryAbilities.description: Deals heavy damage to the first enemy hit.

primaryAbilities.name: Pinning Shot
primaryAbilities.description: Deals moderate damage to an enemy and slows it by 30% for 2.25 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Holo Decoy
primaryAbilities.description: Creates a Decoy for 5 seconds that appears to attack enemies.   Using this Ability does not break cloak.

heroicAbilities.name: Triple Tap
heroicAbilities.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for moderate damage each.

heroicAbilities.name: Precision Strike
heroicAbilities.description: After a short delay, deals massive damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

heroTrait.name: Permanent Cloak, Sniper
heroTrait.description: Cloak when out of combat for 3 seconds. Taking damage, attacking, or channeling reveals you.  Basic Attack range is 20% further than other ranged Heroes, and you see 10% further than other Heroes.

primaryAbilities.name: Penetrating Round
primaryAbilities.description: Deals heavy damage and knocks enemies back.

primaryAbilities.name: Inspire
primaryAbilities.description: Gain 25% bonus Attack Speed for 8 seconds. Nearby allies gain half of the bonus.

primaryAbilities.name: Adrenaline Rush
primaryAbilities.description: Automatically activates to heal for a large amount when you are below 30% Health.

heroicAbilities.name: Hyperion
heroicAbilities.description: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run dealing light damage each second, hitting up to 4 enemies. Also occasionally fires its Yamato Cannon on Structures for massive damage. Lasts 12 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Raynor's Raiders
heroicAbilities.description: Summons two cloaked Banshees that attack a targeted enemy. Each Banshee deals light damage. Last 22 seconds.

heroTrait.name: Advanced Optics
heroTrait.description: Basic Attack range is 20% further than other ranged Heroes, and you see 10% further than other Heroes.

primaryAbilities.name: Spider Mines
primaryAbilities.description: Create 3 mines that deal moderate damage and slow enemies by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Concussive Blast
primaryAbilities.description: Deals moderate damage and pushes enemies away.

primaryAbilities.name: Siege Mode
primaryAbilities.description: Become immobile to increase Basic Attack range by 90%, deal 25% splash damage, and deal 30% bonus damage to Minions and Structures.

heroicAbilities.name: Blunt Force Gun
heroicAbilities.description: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing massive damage to enemies in its path.

heroicAbilities.name: Napalm Strike
heroicAbilities.description: Deals moderate damage on impact and light area damage each second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

heroTrait.name: Artillery
heroTrait.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage to distant enemies.

primaryAbilities.name: Ancient Spear
primaryAbilities.description: Throw out a spear that pulls you to the first enemy hit, dealing heavy damage and briefly stunning them. If this hits, generate 40 Fury.

primaryAbilities.name: Seismic Slam
primaryAbilities.description: Deals heavy damage to the target enemy, and light damage to enemies behind the target.

primaryAbilities.name: Whirlwind
primaryAbilities.description: Deals massive damage to nearby enemies over 4 seconds, and heals for 40% of damage dealt.

heroicAbilities.name: Leap
heroicAbilities.description: Leap into the air, dealing moderate damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Wrath of the Berserker
heroicAbilities.description: Gain 40% Bonus Damage on all Basic Attacks and Abilities. Stuns, slows, silences, polymorphs and roots against you have 50% reduced duration. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained while active.

heroTrait.name: Fury
heroTrait.description: Use Fury instead of Mana, which is gained by taking or dealing damage. Using an Ability grants 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Hook
primaryAbilities.description: Pull the first enemy hit towards you, dealing moderate damage.

primaryAbilities.name: Slam
primaryAbilities.description: Deal moderate damage to enemies within the target area.

primaryAbilities.name: Devour
primaryAbilities.description: Deal massive damage to Minions or moderate damage to Heroes. Restores 20% of your maximum Health.

heroicAbilities.name: Putrid Bile
heroicAbilities.description: Emit bile that deals light damage each second to enemies within, slowing them by 35%. You gain 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Gorge
heroicAbilities.description: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 3.5 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes heavy damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources. Stitches' Movement Speed is reduced by 15% while an enemy is Gorged.  Cannot be used on massive Heroes.

heroTrait.name: Vile Gas
heroTrait.description: When damaged, Stitches emits a gas cloud that persists for 4 seconds. Enemies who enter it are poisoned, taking light damage each second for 3 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Plasma Shield
primaryAbilities.description: Shield target ally, absorbing a massive amount of damage for 8 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Psionic Storm
primaryAbilities.description: Deal moderate damage each second to enemies in target area for 3 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Dimensional Shift
primaryAbilities.description: Become invulnerable and fully invisible for 1.5 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Archon
heroicAbilities.description: Transform into an Archon, gaining a massive Shield, causing Basic Attacks to deal moderate damage and splash for half additional damage. Lasts for 12 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Force Wall
heroicAbilities.description: Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2.5 seconds.

heroTrait.name: Oracle
heroTrait.description: Greatly increases your vision radius and allows you to detect Stealthed enemy Heroes. Lasts for 5 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: El'Druin's Might
primaryAbilities.description: Deals moderate damage to enemies within target area, slowing them by 25%. Reactivating will teleport you to the blade and slow nearby enemies by 25%.

primaryAbilities.name: Righteousness
primaryAbilities.description: Grants massive Shields to you and strong Shields to nearby allies. Lasts 4 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Smite
primaryAbilities.description: Rake target area for moderate damage. Allies moving through the targeted area gain 25% increased Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Judgment
heroicAbilities.description: Charge the target, dealing moderate damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take moderate damage.

heroicAbilities.name: Sanctification
heroicAbilities.description: While channeling, Tyrael makes all nearby allied Heroes invulnerable and unstoppable. Lasts 3 seconds.  Does not affect Tyrael.

heroTrait.name: Archangel's Wrath
heroTrait.description: When you die, become invulnerable and explode for massive damage after 3.5 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Light of Elune
primaryAbilities.description: Heal yourself for a moderate amount. If cast on an ally, also heals them for a large amount of Health.

primaryAbilities.name: Sentinel
primaryAbilities.description: Send an Owl that travels across the battleground revealing its path. Deals moderate damage to the first enemy Hero hit and reveals them for 5 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Lunar Flare
primaryAbilities.description: After a short delay, deal heavy damage and stun enemies in the target area for 1 second.

heroicAbilities.name: Starfall
heroicAbilities.description: Deal light damage each second and slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 8 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Shadowstalk
heroicAbilities.description: Cloak you and all allied Heroes for 8 seconds. Reveal all enemy Heroes for 3 seconds.

heroTrait.name: Hunter's Mark
heroTrait.description: Marks a target enemy, increasing all damage taken by 25% and revealing them for 4 seconds. Cannot be used on Structures.

primaryAbilities.name: Holy Light
primaryAbilities.description: Heal an ally for a large amount of Health.

primaryAbilities.name: Holy Radiance
primaryAbilities.description: Heal all allies in a line for a large amount of Health, dealing moderate damage to enemies.

primaryAbilities.name: Hammer of Justice
primaryAbilities.description: Deals moderate damage and stuns the target for 1 second.

heroicAbilities.name: Divine Shield
heroicAbilities.description: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Divine Storm
heroicAbilities.description: Deal moderate damage and stun nearby enemies for 1.5 seconds.

heroTrait.name: Eternal Devotion
heroTrait.description: Upon dying, become an Invulnerable spirit for up to 10 seconds. Your Abilities and Basic Attacks do 50% healing and damage.

primaryAbilities.name: Hungering Arrow
primaryAbilities.description: Fire an arrow that deals moderate damage to the first target hit, then seeks up to 2 additional enemies dealing half the initial damage. Can hit an enemy multiple times.

primaryAbilities.name: Multishot
primaryAbilities.description: Deal moderate damage to enemies within the target area.

primaryAbilities.name: Vault
primaryAbilities.description: Dash to the target area.

heroicAbilities.name: Strafe
heroicAbilities.description: Rapidly attack nearby visible enemies with each hit dealing light damage, prioritizing heroes over minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Rain of Vengeance
heroicAbilities.description: Launch 2 waves of Shadow Beasts that deal heavy damage to enemies within the target area, stunning for 0.5 seconds per wave.

heroTrait.name: Hatred
heroTrait.description: Basic Attacks grant a stack of Hatred, up to 10. Each Hatred stack increases Basic Attack damage by 2% and Movement Speed by 1%.

primaryAbilities.name: Cleave
primaryAbilities.description: Deal heavy damage to nearby enemies.

primaryAbilities.name: Singularity Spike
primaryAbilities.description: Flings a Singularity Spike that sticks to the first enemy hit. Deals heavy damage after 1 second and slows the enemy by 40% for 3 seconds.

primaryAbilities.name: Blink
primaryAbilities.description: Teleport to the target location. Using this Ability does not break cloak.

heroicAbilities.name: Shadow Assault
heroicAbilities.description: Your Basic Attacks cause you to charge at enemies and have 20% increased Attack Speed. Lasts for 6 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Void Prison
heroicAbilities.description: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, making allies and enemies invulnerable and unable to act for 5 seconds. You are not affected.

heroTrait.name: Permanent Cloak
heroTrait.description: Automatically cloak when out of combat for 3 seconds.   Taking damage, attacking, or channeling reveals you.
